post.author: 이상훈
post.content:
Greetings. I came across your resume from Monster.ca and is contacting you regarding positions mentioned below. Please review the details below and respond if interested.

Job Title:  .NET Developer or Team Lead
Locations:  Toronto, ON
Travel:     Minimal
Salary:     50K - 70K plus bonus
Start Date: ASAP

When reply, please
- include a current resume
- include a summary of your experience with ALL TECHNOLOGIES LISTED BELOW, and for team lead role, please also include

- Years of experience with team lead
- Number of team member managed

Required Technologies:

- ASP.NET
- C# and/or VB.NET (including ADO.Net)
- ASP
- HTML / DHTML / JavaScript
- SQL Server (TSQL)
- XML / XSLT / CSS
- Microsoft Visual Source Safe
- Assets: Microsoft's Content Management, Commerce or SharePoint servers; Java; CSS or COM

Client Description:

Founded in 1995 as a software development and Internet hosting company, our client's focus is on innovative solutions that take advantage of the
Internet and Internet related technologies. They have an international
client base with customers throughout North America and Europe and have
become experts in the creation of multi-lingual software and Web Sites. They also create browser based, database driven business solutions and create and host innovative and interesting Web sites.

Required Experience:

- A MINIMUM OF 3 YEARS EXPERIENCE WITH .NET PROGRAMMING REQUIRED.
- Strong application development experience and broad exposure to web
application technologies (ASP.NET).
- Exposure to object oriented technologies is required and practical
experience implementing object-oriented systems is a benefit.
- The ability to isolate issues with strong debugging skills is highly
valued.
- Experience with / Exposure to: Conceptual Application Development, Object Oriented Concepts, .Net Framework Concepts, Multi-Tier Architecture, Project Life Cycle, Problem Solving / Debugging Techniques, and Development Best Practices.
- Assets would include experience with / exposure to: Enterprise Application Development, Time Management and Task Management Skills or Documentation / Technical Writing.

Personal Attributes:

- Candidate should excel in self-directed environments and be able to
demonstrate strong problem solving skills.
- The ideal candidate will demonstrate understanding of enterprise project issues, knowledge of multi-tier architecture and be able to communicate principles of sound architecture and design.

Regards,

Ruth Tan
Senior Account Manager
*****************************************
RJS ASSOCIATES INC.
(Tel) 416-291-4417 (Fax) 416-291-5819
Toll Free: 1-877-218-0218
e-mail: ruth@rjscanada.com
HR Solutions... SIMPLIFIED
www.rjscanada.com
post.title: .NET Developer or Team Lead - PERM - Etobicoke
